ValidationRule.description: When Invoice Case Sub Type = "Missing Payment" or "Misapplied Payment" you must populate the Payment Amount field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Dispute_Issue__c, 'Missing Payment'), ISPICKVAL(Dispute_Issue__c , 'Misapplied Payment')), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Invoicing', NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'New') || ISPICKVAL(Status, 'New - Assigned')), ISBLANK(Payment_Amount_Cur__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Invoice Case Sub Type is "Missing Payment" or "Misapplied Payment" you must enter Check Amount
